entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING , Blanc-Sablon
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 06:09 AM AST Saturday 14 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Blowing Snow, -10.6°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Blanc-Sablon Airport 06:49 AM AST Saturday 14 January 2023
Condition: Blowing Snow
Temperature: -10.6°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.6 kPa rising
Visibility: 9.7 km
Humidity: 77 %

Dewpoint: -13.8°C

entry.title: Saturday: Snow and blowing snow. High minus 7.
entry.summary: Snow ending early this morning then cloudy. Snow beginning this afternoon. Blowing snow. Amount 5 cm. Wind northeast 40 km/h gusting to 60. High minus 7. Wind chill minus 22 this morning and minus 16 this afternoon. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Saturday 14 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Snow. Temperature steady near minus 7.
entry.summary: Snow and local blowing snow ending overnight then cloudy. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature steady near minus 7. Wind chill near minus 16. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Saturday 14 January 2023
